title: Lentil.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Lentil_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Lentil. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Lentil_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Hi Lentil
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Lentil_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Lentil.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Lentil.EndDialog]]

title: Lentil.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Nice weather we're having lentil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Is that a joke?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
...I guess

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
that's some real good deadpan comedy there
love it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
ok sure

[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
What did you use to do?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
I used to be a miner

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
a free miner?
I thought all mines were slave labor

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Nah, it was actually good money
can't get good yeild if your labor is starving and terrified

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
well, I guess someone's trying
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Lentil_default_talking>>

title: Lentil.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Lentil, do you know how these caves work?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
I can tell you this is unlike any other cave I've been in
this is no ordinary mine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
...
no shit

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
The bugs have to be living off something
I wonder if it's the energy from the crystals
you feel that energy yourself?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
I do
that's why they made me a channeler

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
yeah, it's like their sun
but what are they feeding off of
surface creatures that wander in

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
us? I guess
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Depressed again Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Of course I am

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Me too
it's like the whole world is a dark void
it's like I'm in a tornado of ash

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
I feel like I'm at the bottom of the sea
I can feel the weight of the whole ocean
crushing my ribcage

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
...
that's good
that's poetry

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
you think so?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
yeah
<<CampEventController upgradePickaxeLevel>>
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Emma, how did you end up enslaved?
Ensared? Stolen?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
My family works on bank owned farm
if we don't make enough in a harvest well
some of us have to get sold off
it works that way for the whole village

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
How Tragic
I could always seem to find enough ore to stay out of it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
what happened to you?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
a friend got me drunk one night
and introduced me to some slavers

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
...how does something like that even happen?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Desparation on their part, I guess
Finders fee thing i guess
I don't even think they got much for me.

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
How do you feel?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
A bastard like that, who does something like that
it stains their soul
it will follow them like a goul, forever
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Lentil_default_talking>>

title: Lentil.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Emma, weird question for you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
ok

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
what happens after we die?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Uh, I don't want to think about it
if there's nothing, it's terrifying
I can only hope there's something

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
why? It'll be like before you were born
you won't even be able to percive of it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
yeah sure but

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
but what

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
what's the point of this discussion?
are you trying to prove something?
I guess you don't belive in anything huh

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
...I didn't say that
you wanna know what I think?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
what?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
I think we get to see our old friends and family
and every past life
we all get to share one last moment together
and then we choose to go back to life
obliterating our memories of everything

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
....

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
horseshit, I know
but it's something
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Lentil i have a weird question for you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
ok sure

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
how much did you get sold for?
sometimes me and the others, we compare prices

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
what? oh me
like 67 thousand or something

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
was it at an auction or something?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
no they just weighed me and stuck a price tag on
no real logic behind it I don't think
why, what did you go for

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
about 54 thousand

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
oh
like, is there some kind of contest y'all are having?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
I dunno, just curious
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Hi Lentil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
You going to ask me something weird?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
No, you first

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
...
What's your favorite color?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
that's your question?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
well, do you have one?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
....
I'm not dignifying that with a response

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
ok, fine
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Hi Lentil

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Hi Emma


<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_silent>>
Hey
So my favorite color is actually blue

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
Oh, ok
Mine's red

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer lentil_default_talking>>
haha
[[....|Lentil.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Lentil.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Lentil>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Lentil.EndDialog
body: Empty Text
